item.title: The New Computer
item.description: my new computer is humming away in the corner of the room. it’s a brand-new machine I bought a few days ago and features all the modern niceties you might expect from such a tech marvel. the pipes, of course, are now gray-led-free and no longer release those clouds of greenish, mildly hallucinatory vapor we all know and hate, being instead fully encapsulated in a tight mesh of beetle-shell black string fully integrated with the smart, algorithmic-evolving, networked, reverse-emiting embedded walls.
